title: Poster, "Luis Bunuel, Filmpodium", 1980
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: Black poster with a man's face composed of jagged sections and shapes in white and red. At left in top, red text reads: "Luis Bunuel" with black text below which reads: "Filmpodium Zurich/ 7 Jan - 16 Feb 1980/ Kino Movie 7." Additional text in bottom right corner in white.
